task.summary: Added the JUnit library to the project
Stubbed out the methods for the game play and added a convenience method signature for the territories a player has
Changed the way available territories are displayed to the user
Added the id's for each continent
Corrected the game flow for the setup
Refactored the naming for the check for winner method
Added tha ability to continue a turn indefinitely
Added the functionality to print a players name
Updated the flow to allow a user to make a move
Corrected the game flow to let a user keep choosing to attack until Fortify is chosen
Creating new branch and fixed typos
Added debug log info to controller
